alert.note: Alert for Bottineau (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 11:13PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR EASTERN BOTTINEAU...NORTH CENTRAL PIERCE AND SOUTHERN ROLETTE COUNTIES... At 1112 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Barton, or 18 miles north of Rugby, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Wolford around 1200 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Overly and Nanson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
